name: Sugar Rush (itch) (Just Pingu)
description:
You as the player needs to stop the sugar cubes from getting into the coffee cup.

For 2 days I worked on this game to see what I am capable of, I enjoyed working on the game even if it isn't the best I learn what I am capable of doing within 2 days. it is not finished I may return to it at some point but it is not my main priority.
